name: Zoho CRM
description: Integrate with Zoho CRM to list, get, create and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Records
tools.description: List records from a Zoho CRM module (Leads, Contacts, Accounts, Deals, etc.).

tools.name: Get Record
tools.description: Get a single record from a Zoho CRM module by its ID.

tools.name: Create Record
tools.description: Create a new record in a Zoho CRM module. Provide the module name and field values.

tools.name: Update Record
tools.description: Update an existing record in a Zoho CRM module. Provide the module, record ID, and fields to update.

tools.name: Search Records
tools.description: Search records in a Zoho CRM module using criteria, email, phone, or word search.

datacenter.label: Data Center
datacenter.description: Zoho data center region for API requests
